name: orbt - Gravity Defying Action
description:
Simply touch the screen to stay in orbit, avoid the dangerous obstacles and stop your planet from getting sucked into the black hole.

Survive as long as you can, the closer you orbit to the center; the faster you achieve points. Good Luck and have fun playing with gravity!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
● Simple One Touch Controls
● Endless, fast paced, challenging action Game play you can play forever
● Unlock and collect 15 unique planets
● Simple, pure, innovative gameplay
● Achievements
● Leader boards for comparing with friends and globally
● An In-App purchase to remove all the ads and one to unlock all planets
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Website : http://www.nickervision.com
Twitter : https://twitter.com/nickervision
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I made this game in about 75 hours while I was taking a "break" from other frustrating work I was doing. I need to learn to relax.
(Add another 15 hours to that with the latest customization update :) )
